SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwbmHeartFangHuntScript

short doonce

begin ondeath
	Message "As Heart-Fang breathes his last breath, the Hircine's Ring disappears from his finger, and has found a new owner."
	Player.AddItem fbmwBMringhircine 1
	removeitem fbmwBMringhircine 1
	removeitem fbmwbmwerewolfclaw 1
	SetStage fbmwBMWildHunt 69
end

begin gamemode
	if(fbmwBMWildHunt.fangtalk == 2)&&(doonce == 0)
		StartConversation Player GREETING
		set doonce to 1
	elseif(fbmwBMWildHunt.fangtalk == 3)
		additem fbmwBMringhircine 1
		EquipItem2 fbmwBMringhircine
		set fbmwBMWildHunt.fangtalk to 5
		modav aggression 100
		StartCombat Player
	elseif(fbmwBMAAAImAWere.iswerewolf == 1)
		additem fbmwBMringhircine 1
		EquipItem2 fbmwBMringhircine
	;	modav aggression 100
	;	StartCombat Player
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 658 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
